Rapat KUA PPAS, Taufik Gerindra Ingatkan Dinas Soal Ditangkap KPK
04 Nov 2019, 14:47 by Taufiq Siddiq, Martha Warta Silaban
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta- Wakil Ketua DPRD DKI Jakarta, Muhammad Taufik mengkritisi jajaran Dinas Lingkungan Hidup saat mengusulkan pembangunan turap di kali Bantargebang yang masuk dalam wilayah Pemerintahan Bekasi.
Taufik mengingatkan Dinas Lingkungan Hidup soal ditangkap Komisi Pemberantasan Korupsi jika mengusulkan kegiatan di wilayah daerah lain dengan APBD Jakarta. "Nanti bapak ditangkap KPK itu," ujar Taufik dalam rapat pembahasan KUA PPAS di Komisi D DPRD DKI, Senin 4 November 2019.
Hal tersebut disampaikan Taufik saat menanggapi usulan Unit Pengelola Sampah Terpadu Bentargebang yang akan membangun turap di Kali Cileungsi yang berada dalam kawasan Bekasi.
Taufik mengatakan di Jakarta saja pemerintah provinsi tidak bisa terlibat membuat kegiatan di 13 kali lantaran sudah dikelola oleh Pemerintah Pusat. Jika pemerintah provinsi mengajukan kata dia bakal langsung diperiksa oleh Badan Pemeriksa Keuangan. "Kalau dianggarkan dipanggil BPK kita," ujar Taufik yang pernah jadi tahanan KPK dalam kasus korupsi pengadaan alat peraga Pemilu tahun 2004.
Kepala Unit Pengelola Sampah Terpadu (UPST) Dinas Lingkungan Hidup DKI Jakarta Asep Kuswanto menjelaskan rencana pembangunan turap tersebut karena wilayah tersebut dalam bagian Bantargebang. "Tadinya kami pikir karena memang ada di area TPST Bantargebang,"ujarnya.

KUA PPAS Meeting, Taufik Gerindra Reminds the KPK Arrested Problem Office
04 Nov 2019, 14:47 by Taufiq Siddiq, Martha Warta Silaban
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Deputy Chairperson of DKI Jakarta DPRD, Muhammad Taufik criticized the ranks of the Environment Agency when proposing the construction of the pile on the Bantargebang river which was included in the Bekasi Government area.
Taufik reminded the Office of the Environment about being arrested by the Corruption Eradication Commission if it proposed activities in other regions with the Jakarta APBD. "Later, the KPK will be arrested by the KPK," Taufik said in a KUA PPAS discussion meeting at Commission D of the DKI DPRD, Monday 4 November 2019.
This was conveyed by Taufik when responding to the proposal of the Bentargebang Integrated Waste Management Unit to build a sheet pile in the Cileungsi River which is in the Bekasi area.
Taufik said in Jakarta alone the provincial government could not be involved in making activities 13 times because it had been managed by the Central Government. If the provincial government submits the word he will immediately be examined by the Supreme Audit Agency. "If it is budgeted to be called our BPK," said Taufik who had been a KPK prisoner in a corruption case for the procurement of props in the 2004 elections.
Head of the Integrated Waste Management Unit (UPST) of the DKI Jakarta Environment Agency Asep Kuswanto explained the plan to construct the sheet pile because the area is in the Bantargebang section. "At first we thought because it is indeed in the Bantargebang TPST area," he said.
